statements: UPDATE customers SET age = 30, preferences = '{"color": "blue", "theme": "light"}' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE customers SET interactions = '{"page_views": 150, "clicks": 25}' WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customers SET preferences = '{"color": "blue", "theme": "dark"}' WHERE email = 'johndoe@example.com';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'new_email@example.com', preferences = '{"theme": "dark"}' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'purchase' WHERE customer_id = 1 AND interaction_id = 100;
UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', preferences = '{"theme": "dark", "notifications": true}' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE customer_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00';
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET campaign_type = 'Social Media' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE customers SET preference = 'Special Offers' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE customer_id = 3 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE customer_id = 'e11f1d3b-394e-4e0d-8073-b1cbf0a365a4';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'Email', interaction_data = '{"subject": "New Offer", "body": "Check out our latest offers!"}' WHERE customer_id = 'e11f1d3b-394e-4e0d-8073-b1cbf0a365a4';
UPDATE customers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'purchase', interaction_data = '{"total_amount": 100}' WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE customers SET preference = 'Email' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE interaction_id = 5;
UPDATE customers SET preference='Email' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='Survey' WHERE interaction_id=3;
